content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Who was That? You are slowed 1 until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Seeing Double You are dazzled until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Broken Tooth Until healed, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls.

Unarmed
Fragmented Magic Your target gains the effect of a mirror image spell.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #8
